errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to do this.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.failedToLogSet: Failed to log set. Please try again.
errors.failedToAddExercise: Failed to add exercise. Please try again.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in with your email to continue
login.magicLinkInfo: We'll send you a magic link for a password-free sign in
login.termsAndPrivacy: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
login.checkEmailMessage: We sent a magic link to <email></email>
login.linkExpiryInfo: Click the link in your email to sign in. The link will expire in 1 hour.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.failed: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noWorkoutsMessage: No completed workouts yet. Complete your first workout to see it here!

summary.title: Workout Summary
summary.mentalReadinessTitle: How did you feel mentally during this workout?
summary.mentalReadinessDescription: This helps us understand your overall mental state and optimize future workouts
summary.notesDescription: Did you experience any pain? Technique issues? Preferences on exercises or recovery? Share your observations here to improve your future workouts.
summary.notesPlaceholder: E.g., I felt a slight pain in my left shoulder during the Military Press. I prefer to use dumbbells for Chest Press...
summary.mentalReadinessRequired: Please select your mental state before completing the workout

setLogger.tempoDescription: Maintain this tempo for optimal time under tension

exercise.restDescription: Rest allows ATP recovery for optimal performance on your next set
exercise.exerciseLimitReached: You have reached the limit of 3 extra exercises. Remove an exercise to add a new one.

modificationWarning.keyboardHints: ESC to cancel • ENTER to proceed

onboarding.subtitle: Let's set up your personalized training program

approach.title: Choose Your Training Philosophy
approach.description: Select the approach that best aligns with your training style. This will guide how the AI generates your workouts.
approach.noApproachesFound: No training approaches found. Please run the seed script to populate the Kuba Method.

split.title: Choose Your Training Split
split.description: Select how you want to organize your training week. This determines how muscle groups are distributed across workouts.

push_pull_legs.name: Push / Pull / Legs
push_pull_legs.description: Separate pushing, pulling, and leg movements across different days. Ideal for balanced development and high frequency.

upper_lower.name: Upper / Lower
upper_lower.description: Alternate between upper body and lower body workouts. Great for strength and balanced recovery.

full_body.name: Full Body
full_body.description: Train all major muscle groups each session. Perfect for beginners or those with limited training days.

custom.name: Custom Split
custom.description: Let the AI create a customized split based on your preferences and training approach.

split.frequencyLabel: How many days per week can you train?
split.frequencyDescription: This helps us optimize your split and volume distribution.

recommendations.label: Recommendation:
recommendations.low: Full Body split is ideal for 2 or fewer training days per week.
recommendations.three: Push/Pull/Legs or Full Body work well with 3 days per week.
recommendations.medium: Upper/Lower or Push/Pull/Legs provide optimal frequency and recovery.
recommendations.high: Push/Pull/Legs allows high frequency training with adequate recovery.

equipment.title: Equipment Preferences
equipment.description: Select all the equipment you have access to. The AI will use this to generate personalized workouts.

weakPoints.title: Identify Your Weak Points
weakPoints.description: Select up to 3 muscle groups that you want to prioritize. The AI will adjust workout volume and exercise selection accordingly.
weakPoints.optionalNote: This is optional - you can skip if you don't have specific weak points.

strength.title: Strength Baseline
strength.description: Add your current strength levels for exercises you know. This helps the AI set appropriate starting weights.
strength.optional: This is optional - the AI can estimate starting weights if you skip this step.

addExercise.placeholder: Add exercise (e.g., Bench Press, Panca Piana, etc.)
addExercise.typeToSearch: Type to search or add custom exercise

emptyState.title: No exercises added yet
emptyState.description: Use the search box above to add your first exercise

exerciseCard.validationError: Please fill in all fields for this exercise

tip.label: Tip:
tip.description: RIR (Reps in Reserve) indicates how many more reps you could have done. For example, RIR 1 means you stopped with 1 rep left in the tank.

profile.title: Your Profile (Optional)
profile.description: Help the AI personalize your training with better recommendations, strength standards, and insights.
profile.allOptional: All fields are optional - you can skip this entirely and the app will work great.

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.tooltip: Your name helps us personalize your experience with greetings and feedback

gender.label: Gender
gender.tooltip: Used for more accurate strength standards and initial weight estimations

age.label: Age
age.tooltip: Helps the AI adjust recovery recommendations and progression rates

weight.label: Bodyweight (kg)
weight.tooltip: Essential for calculating relative strength (e.g., 1.5x bodyweight squat) and Wilks score

height.label: Height (cm)
height.tooltip: Optional - used for body composition tracking and BMI calculations

review.title: Review Your Profile
review.description: Review your selections below. The AI will use this information to generate your personalized workouts.
review.completeSteps: Please complete the previous steps first.

strength.provided: {count} {count, plural, one {exercise} other {exercises}} with baseline data

errors.userNotFound: User not found. Please log in again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your training preferences and profile

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface and AI-generated content

progress.title: Progress
progress.noData: No data available yet. Complete some workouts to see your progress!
